name: N Less O
description:
Hi there my name is Juane Gray I am 20 years old from New Zealand.

I Am Studying Games (Specific Art) At Media Design school in Auckland. I have been studying for 5 years and have completed computing levels 2 - 5, 2 ½ years to go.

I have Used Programs such as: Gamemaker: Studio/8.1, Unity 4/5, Blender 2.5, Maya, Photoshop, Zbrush, Sculptris, Google sketch up, Scratch, Rpg Maker, Roblox and others as such.

I like to make games and art in my spare time which is basically all the time

Thanks Killa 24/7.
